QuestData.Title: The Menders' Stead
QuestData.Description: These men and women here at Chillwind Camp have noble goals, but their ultimate purpose is war. I would like to offer you an opportunity to pursue more peaceful goals.$b$bAt the Menders' Stead, beyond war-torn Andorhal to the north, the Argent Crusade has joined forces with the Cenarion Circle. Together, we work on healing this land from the plague that used to reign here.$b$bAre you interested in joining our cause, $c?
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Field Agent Kaartish at the Menders' Stead in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome, $c. As you can see, our camp is a joint expedition between Argent Crusade members and Cenarion Circle druids, but we welcome all who wish to help heal the land.
